ruleBookInfo.author: author@js:java.t2s(result)
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>var data = JSON.parse(result);
var comic = data.results.comic;
var author = "";
if (comic.author && Array.isArray(comic.author)) {
    var authorNames = [];
    for (var a = 0; a < comic.author.length; a++) {
        var authorName = comic.author[a].name || "";
        authorNames.push(authorName.replace(/\s/g, "ï¼Œ"));
    }
    author = authorNames.join("ï¼Œ");
}
    
var kindParts = [];
if (comic.theme && Array.isArray(comic.theme)) {
    var themes = [];
    for (var t = 0; t < Math.min(comic.theme.length, 3); t++) {
        if (comic.theme[t].name) {
            themes.push(comic.theme[t].name);
        }
    }
    if (themes.length > 0) {
        kindParts.push(themes.join(","));
    }
}

if (comic.status && comic.status.display) {
    kindParts.push(comic.status.display);
}
if (comic.females && Array.isArray(comic.females)) {
    var females = [];
    for (var f = 0; f < Math.min(comic.females.length, 3); f++) {
        if (comic.females[f].name) {
            females.push(comic.females[f].name);
        }
    }
    if (females.length > 0) {
        kindParts.push(females.join(","));
    }
}
var kind = kindParts.join(",");


var name = comic.name || "";
var cover = comic.cover || "";
var lastchapter = "";
var introText = comic.brief || "";
var groups = data.results.groups;
var groupNames = [];
var groupPathWords = []; 
//java.log(JSON.stringify(groups))
for (var key in groups) {
    if (groups.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
        var group = groups[key];
        if (group.name && group.path_word) {
            groupNames.push(group.name);
            groupPathWords.push(group.path_word);
        }
    }
}
v = book.getVariable("custom") !="" ? book.getVariable("custom") : "0"//è·å–å˜é‡ä¸¥é‡ä»£ç ä¸å¯æ”¹å˜ï¼Œæ°¸ä¸å˜çš„æ’å®šã€‚
if (v >= groupPathWords.length || v < 0) {
    v = groupPathWords.length > 0 ? Math.floor(Math.random() * groupPathWords.length) : 0;
}
var usage = "\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼šè®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡åˆ‡æ¢åˆ†å·æ¥æºï¼ˆé»˜è®¤0ï¼‰";
var currentSource = groupPathWords.length > 0 
    ? "\nğŸ¯å½“å‰åˆ†å·æºï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º" + v + "ğŸ”»ã€" + (groupNames[v] ) + "ã€‘" 
    : "\nâš ï¸æ— å¯ç”¨åˆ†å·æº";
var n = "";
for (var o = 0; o < groupNames.length; o++) {
    var prefix = (o === 0) ? "â­é»˜è®¤ " : "â¤";
    n += prefix + "åºå·ğŸ”º" + o + "ğŸ”»ã€" + groupNames[o] + "ã€‘\n";
}
var intro = introText + "\n" + usage + currentSource + "\n" + n;

var url = "";
if (groupPathWords.length > 0 && comic.path_word) {
    url = "/api/v3/comic/" + comic.path_word + 
          "/group/" + groupPathWords[v] + 
          "/chapters?limit=100&offset=0&_update=true";
}
JSON.stringify({
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    lastchapter: lastchapter,
    intro: intro,
    cover: cover,
    url: url
});</js>
